mutants.code:
def shuffle_array(arr):
    arr.sort()
    left = 1
    right = len(arr) - 1
    result = []
    while left <= right:
        result.append(arr[left])
        left += 1
        if left <= right:
            result.append(arr[right])
            right -= 1
    return result

def shuffle_array(arr):
    arr.sort()
    left = -1
    right = len(arr) - 1
    result = []
    while left <= right:
        result.append(arr[left])

            result.append(arr[right])
            right -= 1
    return result
